articles.title: Swiss airports resume flights after air traffic control glitch - Reuters.com
articles.description: Airports in Zurich and Geneva began to ramp up service on Wednesday after a technical problem with the air traffic control system halted takeoffs and landings for hours.
articles.content:
ZURICH, June 15 (Reuters) - Airports in Zurich and Geneva began to ramp up service on Wednesday after a technical problem with the air traffic control system halted takeoffs and landings for hours.
